document.discussion_title: Derwent London Plc (DLN) Rating Lowered to Add at Numis Securities Ltd
document.topic_text: Tweet Numis Securities Ltd lowered shares of Derwent London Plc (LON:DLN) to an add rating in a research report released on Tuesday morning. Numis Securities Ltd currently has GBX 3,164 ($40.74) price target on the real estate investment trust’s stock, down from their previous price target of GBX 3,850 ($49.58). Derwent London Plc ( LON:DLN ) opened at 2706.00 on Tuesday. Derwent London Plc has a 52-week low of GBX 2,230.00 and a 52-week high of GBX 3,891.00. The stock’s 50 day moving average is GBX 2,720.03 and its 200 day moving average is GBX 3,041.67. The company’s market cap is GBX 3.01 billion. The business also recently announced a dividend, which will be paid on Friday, October 21st. Stockholders of record on Thursday, September 15th will be given a dividend of GBX 13.86 ($0.18) per share. The ex-dividend date is Thursday, September 15th. This represents a dividend yield of 0.51%. Several other research analysts have also recently commented on DLN. Jefferies Group reduced their target price on Derwent London Plc from GBX 3,055 ($39.34) to GBX 2,950 ($37.99) and set a hold rating for the company in a research report on Thursday, April 21st. Liberum Capital reissued a hold rating and set a GBX 2,859 ($36.81) price objective on shares of Derwent London Plc in a report on Thursday, May 5th. BNP Paribas reissued a neutral rating and set a GBX 3,430 ($44.17) price objective on shares of Derwent London Plc in a report on Thursday, May 5th. JPMorgan Chase & Co. reissued an overweight rating and set a GBX 4,150 ($53.44) price objective on shares of Derwent London Plc in a report on Friday, May 6th. Finally, Goldman Sachs Group Inc. reissued a neutral rating and set a GBX 3,327 ($42.84) price objective on shares of Derwent London Plc in a report on Thursday, May 19th. Two equities research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, ten have issued a hold rating and seven have given a buy rating to the company. The company presently has an average rating of Hold and a consensus price target of GBX 3,337.35 ($42.97). In other news, insider Silver,Simon P sold 30,000 shares of the business’s stock in a transaction dated Wednesday, June 8th. The stock was sold at an average price of GBX 3,329 ($42.87), for a total transaction of £998,700 ($1,285,990.21). Also, insider Burns,John David sold 45,000 shares of the business’s stock in a transaction dated Wednesday, June 22nd. The stock was sold at an average price of GBX 3,308 ($42.60), for a total value of £1,488,600 ($1,916,816.89). Derwent London plc is a United Kingdom-based real estate investment trust (REIT) operating in central London region. The Company owns and manages a portfolio of approximately 6.2 million square feet located in over 15 villages in London’s West End and City borders and focus on middle market rents. The Company’s property portfolio includes investment property, owner-occupied property and trading property. Derwent London Plc Derwent London Plc
